tool.name: qiime2 sample-classifier regress-samples
tool.description: Train and test a cross-validated supervised learning regressor.

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency | PresenceAbsence | Composition]
param.help: [required] Feature table containing all features that should be used for target prediction.

param.name: type
param.label: metadata: MetadataColumn[Numeric]
param.help: [required] Numeric metadata column to use as prediction target.

validator.message: The first column cannot be selected (they are IDs).

param.name: test_size
param.label: test_size: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0)
param.help: [default: 0.2] Fraction of input samples to exclude from training set and use for classifier testing.

param.name: step
param.label: step: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_start=False)
param.help: [default: 0.05] If optimize_feature_selection is True, step is the percentage of features to remove at each iteration.

param.name: cv
param.label: cv: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 5] Number of k-fold cross-validations to perform.

param.name: random_state
param.label: random_state: Int
param.help: [optional] Seed used by random number generator.

param.name: n_estimators
param.label: n_estimators: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 100] Number of trees to grow for estimation. More trees will improve predictive accuracy up to a threshold level, but will also increase time and memory requirements. This parameter only affects ensemble estimators, such as Random Forest, AdaBoost, ExtraTrees, and GradientBoosting.

param.name: optimize_feature_selection
param.label: optimize_feature_selection: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Automatically optimize input feature selection using recursive feature elimination.

param.name: stratify
param.label: stratify: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Evenly stratify training and test data among metadata categories. If True, all values in column must match at least two samples.

param.name: parameter_tuning
param.label: parameter_tuning: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Automatically tune hyperparameters using random grid search.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: sample-classifier regress-samples ========================================== Train and test a cross-validated supervised learning regressor.
Outputs: -------- :sample_estimator.qza: Trained sample estimator. :feature_importance.qza: Importance of each input feature to model accuracy. :predictions.qza: Predicted target values for each input sample. :model_summary.qzv: Summarized parameter and (if enabled) feature selection information for the trained estimator. :accuracy_results.qzv: Accuracy results visualization.
|
Description: ------------ Predicts a continuous sample metadata column using a supervised learning regressor. Splits input data into training and test sets. The training set is used to train and test the estimator using a stratified k-fold cross-validation scheme. This includes optional steps for automated feature extraction and hyperparameter optimization. The test set validates classification accuracy of the optimized estimator. Outputs classification results for test set. For more details on the learning algorithm, see http://scikit-learn.org/stable/supervised_learning.html
|
